name: runson
description: Runs On is a self-hosted platform for running GitHub Actions runners on your own infrastructure, allowing full control over CI environments and secrets.
features: Self-hosted runners: Run GitHub Actions workflows on your own infrastructure.
Cost control: Avoid GitHub-hosted runner costs by using your own hardware.
Custom environments: Configure runners with specific tools, dependencies, or configurations.
Secrets management: Keep sensitive credentials on your infrastructure instead of GitHub.
Scalable architecture: Add or remove runner capacity based on workflow demands.
Multiple repositories: Share runners across multiple GitHub repositories or organizations.
Workflow isolation: Run jobs in isolated environments for security and consistency.
Resource monitoring: Track CPU, memory, and disk usage across runner instances.
Auto-scaling: Automatically provision runners when workflows are queued.
Network control: Run workflows behind firewalls or with access to internal resources.
Compliance support: Meet regulatory requirements by keeping CI/CD on-premises.
Dashboard interface: Monitor runner status and job execution through a web UI.
